mapper.select: select id, main_image, name, channel_price, price, limit_stock, stock, remain_stock, detail, company from wx_product where id = #{id}
mapper.sql: select o.id, p.`name`, p.company, p.main_image, i.price, i.num, i.total, o.`status`, o.order_no,o.order_type, o.phone, o.wx_code, o.card_id, date_format(o.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time from wx_order o, wx_product p, wx_order_item i where o.id = i.order_id and i.product_id = p.id and o.order_type in (0,1)

select o.id, p.`name`, p.company, p.main_image, i.price, i.num, i.total, o.`status`, o.order_no,o.order_type, o.phone, o.wx_code, o.card_id, date_format(o.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time from wx_order o, wx_product p, wx_order_item i where o.id = i.order_id and o.order_type in (0,1)

select o.id, p.`name`, p.company, p.main_image, i.price, i.num, i.total, o.`status`, o.order_no,o.order_type, o.phone, o.wx_code, o.card_id, date_format(o.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time from wx_order o, wx_product p, wx_order_item i where o.id = i.order_id and i.product_id = p.id
mapper.select: and o.card_id = ${cardId} GROUP BY o.id order by o.create_time desc

select o.id, i.message as name, c.realname as company, i.price, i.num, i.total,i.message, o.`status`, o.order_no,o.order_type, o.phone, o.wx_code, o.card_id, date_format(o.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time from wx_order o, wx_product p, wx_order_item i, card_info c where o.id = i.order_id and o.order_type in (0,1) and o.card_id = ${cardId} and c.id = ${cardId} GROUP BY o.id order by o.create_time desc

select o.id, c.realname as company,i.message as name, i.price, i.num, i.total, o.`status`, o.order_no,o.order_type, o.phone, o.wx_code, o.card_id, date_format(o.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time from wx_order o, wx_product p, wx_order_item i,card_info c where o.id = i.order_id and o.id = ${id} and c.id = o.card_id GROUP BY o.id

select o.id, i.price, i.num, i.total, o.`status`, o.order_no,o.order_type, o.phone, o.wx_code, o.card_id, date_format(o.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time from wx_order o, wx_order_item i where o.id = i.order_id and o.id = ${id}
mapper.sql: select o.id, p.`name`, p.company, p.main_image, i.price, i.num, i.total, o.`status`, o.order_no,o.order_type, o.phone, o.wx_code, o.card_id, date_format(o.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time from wx_order o, wx_product_recharge p, wx_order_item i where o.id = i.order_id and i.product_id = p.id and o.order_type = 1
mapper.select: and o.card_id = ${cardId} order by o.create_time desc limit #{start}, #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into wx_order(order_no, payment, card_id, status, create_time, order_type) values(#{orderNo}, #{total}, #{cardId}, 0, #{createTime}, #{order_type})
insert into wx_order_item(order_id, product_id, price, num, total, create_time,message) values(#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{price}, #{num}, #{total}, #{createTime},#{body})
insert into wx_order_pay(order_id, order_no, payment, message) values(#{orderId}, #{orderNo}, #{payment}, #{message})
insert into wx_order_pay_score(order_id, order_no, payment, message) values(#{orderId}, #{orderNo}, #{payment}, #{message})
mapper.update: update wx_order set status = 1 where id = #{id}
update wx_product set read_count = read_count + 1 where id =#{id}
update wx_product set give_like = give_like + 1 where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select url from wx_product_picture where product_id = #{productId}
